title: Competency Strengthening Course Through Flipped Learning in Medical Education (CME)

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic medical principles and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a digital device-provided setting, featuring discussion and practice-centered in-person classes based on pre-learning materials

learning_goals: Learners will acquire core discipline-specific knowledge by completing ≥80% of online modules provided in a flipped learning environment
Learners will enhance problem-solving competencies by 20% through case analyses based on pre-learning content in face-to-face classes
Learners will rate their perception of the flipped learning approach ≥3.5 on a 5-point scale
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
